commit.message:
Increase default value of ShenandoahGenerationalEvacWaste

The new value is 2.0 based on experimentation with dacapo tomcat.
Merge branch 'shenandoah' of ssh://git.amazon.com/pkg/OpenJDKTipSrc into rectify-evacuation-imbalance

Add options to control evacuation efficiency

Two options added with defaults values that seem to improve generational
evacuation performance, reducing likelihood of evacuation failures and
thus reducing frequency of degeneration and upgraded full GC.  The
options are:
-XX:ShenandoahGenerationalEvacWaste=1.6 (default)
-XX:ShenandoahMaxEvacLABRatio-16

Revert "Mutator may fail to evacuate"

This reverts commit 2132a6d151e4c46b71a220100fa478a8be676f13.
